synopsis.text: In 1212 AD, an innocent soldier is betrayed and vows to return from death as a fallen angel. He is reborn in present day as Aiko, a woman haunted by memories of a past life. Aiko rises to become the military leader of a new violent crusade, successfully uniting the world and abolishing religion. Seeking to understand her memories, Aiko travels back in time where she finds herself caught in an incredible battle that will determine the fate of the future.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
